General.Text: ~g~Dispatch~s~: Drive to ~y~Mount Chiliad Gas Station~w~ at the highway, ~r~Detective~w~ required.

Officer.Dialogue: Go to the ~b~officer~w~ and talk to her using
~b~Officer~s~: Hello Detective! Glad you are here!
~b~Officer~s~: We have a dead person to my right and two possible suspects.
~b~Officer~s~: Please go to the ~r~crime scene~w~ to my right and ~r~investigate~s~, see, if you can find something.

Evidence.Text: ~y~You~s~: A ~r~fresh empty bottle of liquor~s~, I wonder if it even belongs to the victim...
~y~You~s~: The wounds appear to be ~o~multiple stab wounds~s~, to the neck, belly and back.
Investigation finished! Go to a ~r~suspect~w~ and talk to him using

Suspect1.Dialogue: ~y~You~s~: Hello, I'm the detective in this case, I have a few questions for you.
~o~Ayla May~s~: I'm so ~r~nervous~w~. I haven't got anything to do with this.
~y~You~s~: Don't worry, you're fine. What kind of alcohol do you drink?
~o~Ayla May~s~: I drink alcohol as good as ~g~never~w~... and if I do maybe a glass of red wine.
~o~Ayla May~s~: ~g~No~w~, I live a healthy lifestyle, I do a lot of sport, too.
~y~You~s~: That would be all, thanks for your time.

Suspect2.Dialogue: ~y~You~s~: Hi, I'm the ~r~detective~s~ in this case, may I ask you some questions?
~r~Jameson Fisher~s~: Howdy! Yeeeaaaaahh, do't be shyyyyyyy *laughs*
~y~You~s~: You appear ~r~intoxicated~w~, how much do you had to drink?!
~r~Jameson Fisher~s~: I haven't had anything, not even a drooooopp...
~y~You~s~: Please take this seriously. What are you working as?
~r~Jameson Fisher~s~: Sure, I'm a ~o~hunter~w~, I have a forest not too far from here.
~y~You~s~: Okay, do you eat ~r~chips~w~ as often as I do?
~r~Jameson Fisher~s~: Yeeeaaaaah, ~r~I LOVE chips~w~, I always eat them, ~y~I just ate a pack...
~y~You~s~: We're finished with questioning, I'll let you know how we continue.

Officer2.Dialogue: Go talk to the ~b~Officer~w~ again using
~b~Officer~w~: And could you find out based on evidence and talking who the ~r~murderer~w~ is?
~y~You~s~: Yes, I think the murderer is... ~o~[1] Ayla May ~r~[2] Jameson Fisher
~b~Officer~w~: Alright, go ahead and arrest the suspect!

Arrest.Text: Oh no, you unfortunately have arrested an ~r~innocent~w~ person! ~o~Code 4~w~
Call a ~b~Coroner~w~ to pick up the ~y~victim~w~ and then transport the ~r~suspect~w~ to ~o~prison~w~.
~g~Ayla May ~r~died.~s~ Are you sure it was neccessary? ~g~Code 4~s~
~b~Jameson Fisher ~r~died,~s~ I hope you have a good attorney!? ~g~Code 4~s~
The ~b~Officer~s~ ~r~died~s~, thats not a good ending!? ~g~Code 4~s~
